distribution_strategy: The document is divided among three SubMasters to focus on distinct aspects of the research paper. SubMaster 1 will handle the Abstract and Introduction, providing an overview and context. SubMaster 2 will focus on the Related Work section, identifying key prior research and methodologies. SubMaster 3 will be responsible for extracting key findings and methodologies from the entire document, as per the user's primary request, by synthesizing information from all sections. This distribution ensures that the core objective of extracting key findings and methodologies is met while also covering the foundational sections of the paper.

submasters.role: Summarize Abstract and Introduction to provide context and overview.
Extract methodologies and key concepts from Related Work.
Extract key findings and methodologies across the entire document.
